Comment: Abilities: A01D (Words of Protection), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: The hero heals and gives additional armor to nearby friendly units for 25 seconds. 350 AOE.|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Heals for 60 and gives 4 armor.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Heals for 90 and gives 6 armor.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Heals for 120 and gives 8 armor.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - Heals for 150 and gives 10 armor.
